title: Komputasi Probabiitas dan Statistika
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
Implement your code in: submissions/w01/answers.py
Push to GitHub → check Actions → check your score in Classroom.
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.2 Setup import

import sys
from pathlib import Path

cwd = Path.cwd().resolve()
repo_root = cwd if (cwd / "weeks").exists() else cwd.parents[1]
sys.path.insert(0, str(repo_root))

from submissions.w01.answers import q01,q02,q03,q04,q05,q06,q07,q08,q09,q10,q11,q12
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.3 Task 01 — At least one head
A fair coin is flipped 3 times. Return P(at least one head).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.4 Task 02 — Combinations
From 10 students, choose 3 (order does not matter). Return the number of committees.
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.5 Task 03 — Conditional probability
In a class of 40 students: - 22 use Python (P) - 18 use R (R) - 10 use both
Return P(Python | R).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.6 Task 04 — Bayes
Disease prevalence P(D)=0.01, sensitivity P(+|D)=0.95, specificity P(-|not D)=0.90.
Return P(D | +).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.7 Task 05 — Expected value
X in {0,1,2,3} with probs [0.1, 0.2, 0.3, 0.4]. Return E[X].
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.8 Task 06 — Binomial PMF
X ~ Binomial(n=4, p=0.3). Return [P(X=0),…,P(X=4)].
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
section: 2.9 Task 07 — Variance of a fair die
text:
2.9 Task 07 — Variance of a fair die
X is uniform over {1..6}. Return Var(X).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.10 Task 08 — Correlation
Cov(X,Y)=2, Var(X)=9, Var(Y)=16. Return Corr(X,Y).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.11 Task 09 — Normal probability
X ~ Normal(μ=10, σ=2). Return P(8 < X < 12).
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.12 Task 10 — Margin of error
Known σ=4, n=25, 95% z=1.96. Return margin of error.
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.13 Task 11 — Two-sided p-value
Two-sided z-test with z=2.1. Return p-value.
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)
text:
2.14 Task 12 — Monte Carlo estimate
Estimate P(Z > 1.5), Z~N(0,1) using: - n=200000 - seed=123 Return estimated probability.
crumbs: 2  Quiz w01 — Sample Space & Basic Probability (12 tasks)

title: 4  Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
